experiences.title: Software Engineer II at Indeed.com
data: Part of the Localisation Tools Team
Independently implemented a multiple-component solution by enabling in-context translation previews through a Storybook add on, Jenkins, AWS S3, Spring boot Java and React Typescript

Spearheaded design and implementation of a frontend UI and backend services for internal localisation project managers to edit, search and view history changes of translation strings across Indeed teams projects

One of the main developers to build an in-house tool, involving microservices and frontend web, to replace Weblate wrapper maintenance costs for enabling outsourcing and syncing back of string translations between product teams' codebases and XTM
Provided technical support and collaborated with engineers in other teams to drive adoption of Localisation Tools team's tools
Championed good software engineering practices in the team by encouraging the use of Merge Request templates and hosted software engineering design patterns study sessions
Nurtured junior engineers through mentorship in one-on-one meeting sessions
Contributed to the organization by interviewing potential hire engineers/managers and represented Indeed at university recruitment events

experiences.title: Graduated from the National University of Singapore
data: Graduated with a Bachelor of Computing in Computer Science degree

Took courses in operating system, computer network, database systems, data structure and algorithms, software engineering, introduction to machine learning & artificial intelligence, mathematics (linear algebra, calculus, probability and statistics)

2 years Ridge View residential college program where I took part in college activities such as attending forums and classes relating to environment and sustainability, as well as participating in field trips (charity events and industrial site visits)

In my third year of university, I was selected to be part of the NUS Overseas College program. I studied at Peking University in Beijing as an exchange student and interned at IQAir-Airvisual for a period of 6 months. I participated in several Beijing hackathon events and attended entrepreneurship related talks and networking events.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern at Temasek Holdings
data: Built API and UI for adding Feedback feature to mobile application for company internal usage with React-Native
Classified companies into categories using machine learning models like Bert and Sci-learn for investment analysts' usage

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern at IQAir-AirVisual
data: Used JavaScript to perform Web Scraping on different websites for the collection of air quality data to be displayed on the mobile AirVisual App
Developed Kibana Plugin interfaces with React-Redux to help engineers to monitor and track and manage air quality metrics displayed on the app

experiences.title: Part-time Tutor at Coding Lab
data: Taught students from ages 7-16 computational thinking, Python language and Scratch programming
Created Google Apps script to automate sign-ups, class allocation, and sending of lessons' email notifications

experiences.title: Started school at the National University of Singapore
data: Bachelor of Computing in Computer Science degree

experiences.title: Dental Assistant at Burlinson Dental Surgery
data: Assisted dentist in procedures such as scaling and polishing, dental filling and tooth extraction surgeries
Handled clinic operational duties such as replenishing dental stocks, cleaning clinic and sterilising dental tools
Performed customer support duties such as patients' appointment booking, payment management and answering enquiries

experiences.title: Banquet Server
data: Provided banquet server services during events and functions at various hotels and venues
Served food and beverages to guests, assisted in setting up and tearing down event setups
Ensured high-quality customer service and satisfaction

experiences.title: Student at Victoria Junior College
data: Studied Science Stream and graduated with the Singapore Cambridge A' Levels certificate
Studied H2 Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Economics and H1 General Paper. (H2 being of higher difficulty)
Member of Art club and Writers' circle

experiences.title: Student at Nan Chiau High School
data:
Graduated with the Singapore Cambridge O' Levels certificate
  • Studied Advanced Mathematics, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Pure Geography, Combined Humanities (Social Studies and History), Higher Chinese, English
Represented school for Basketball tournaments. My team achieved 2nd place in North zone and 8th place overall in the C' division of the 2012 Singapore Basketball Nationals

Awarded the Bicultural (English and Mandarin) scholarship given to 12 students of my cohort by the Singapore Hokkien Huay Kuan association. With this scholarship, I participated in 2-week long student exchange trips to Suzhou Foreign Language School (Shanghai and Suzhou, 2012) and Sacred Heart Girls High school (Taiwan, 2013)
Top student in cohort for combined humanities subject (Social studies and History)
Selected as 1 out of 4 students to represent school in NUS Geography Challenge and obtained individual Silver medal

experiences.title: Student at Chong Zheng Primary School
data: Graduated with a PSLE certificate
Studied Mathematics, Science, English and Chinese
Represented school for Netball tournaments

experiences.title: My birth
data: I came into this world!
